MS MCQs

    Work with functional locations in Asset Management for Dynamics 365 Supply Chain Management

    »

    1. Which of the following statements best describes the use of functional locations in Asset Management?

      Functional locations allow you to define where maintenance workers are located.

      Functional locations help you manage your site and warehouse locations.

      Functional locations give you the ability to define and track where your assets are located.

      Functional locations are used to help determine where work should be assigned to.


    2. Which statement is true about parent assets?

      Financial dimensions that are related to a functional location cannot be installed on an asset.

      After you’ve installed assets on a functional location, you can replace a parent asset or an asset structure as you require.

      Related sub assets on a parent have to be manually assigned to a functional location.


    3. Which of the following components must be set up before you can create a functional location?

      Number sequences

      Functional location types

      Parent functional locations
